column4: hey all, try to boot a livecd (8.041) on my dual-pIII , get this flaming error: MP-BIOS bug: 8254 timer not connected to IO-APIC  also booting with noapci wouldnt work
happens a lot but doesn't really do any harm. google should have some more info i think
ubuntu is giving me busybox. i could not boot anyway to ubuntu
hmm i dunno then. have u tried googling the error code?
